description: LightGBM model for muscular injury risk (35-day horizon), trained on ALL seasons (2008_2009-2025_2026) with 10% target ratio and correlation threshold 0.8. This is the production version trained on all available data including the previous test season.

data.train_seasons: 2008_2009-2025_2026 (10% target ratio, muscular only, ALL seasons including previous test season)
data.test_season: Natural 2025_2026 (for evaluation only, not used in training)

training_approach.validation_strategy: Trained on all available data (no external hold-out)
training_approach.note: v1 remains the audited benchmark with external test set. v2 is for production deployment with maximum data utilization.

notes: Features were preprocessed using the prepare_data pipeline in scripts/train_models_seasonal_combined.py.
Final feature set size after correlation filtering: 4,059 features (LightGBM internally used 2,003 features).
This model version includes the 2025-2026 season in training (previously held out as test in v1).
Evaluation on natural 2025-2026 is for monitoring purposes only, not for model selection.
